full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) Solutions for Transport Canada
#### Solicitation Number: T8080-220683-1
#### Reference Number: CB-6865-74265177

**Request Description:**
Transport Canada is seeking proposals for Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions to manage its Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) programs. The solution will be used by approximately 7,000 employees to support the implementation and management of OHS programs.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful proposal will include:

* Training for users and administrators
* Installation of a Transport Canada system within the SaaS solution
* Integration of the SaaS solution with Transport Canada’s current system
* Development of processes, templates, user guides, and reports
* Real-time visualization of data in integrated dashboards or Microsoft Power BI

**Proposal Details:**
The request is open to all interested vendors, and proposals will be evaluated based on a combined score of technical merit and price.

**Key Dates:**
* Publication Date: 30 Jun 2023
* Tender Closing Date: 23 Aug 2023 at 15:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 1 Sep 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 Aug 2028

**Contact Information:**
For further information or clarification, please contact:
Trevor Hardman
Email: [trevor.hardman@tc.gc.ca](mailto:trevor.hardman@tc.gc.ca)
Phone: 431-335-3874

**Document Attachment:**
The complete Request for Proposal can be found on the Government of Canada’s Buy and Sell website at the following locations:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6865/t8080-220683-1---rfp-e_0.pdfhttps://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6865/t8080-220683-1---rfp-002-eng.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6865/t8080-220683-1---rfp-001-eng.pdf

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is open to vendors who are registered under the following trade agreements:
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Comprehensive
